name: Glorious Enchant
active: Glory: Grants 30% Movement Speed and 20% Attack Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
tips: Glorious EnchantIncreases Movement SpeedGlory (Active): Gain +30% Move Speed.
After 4s or when near an enemy champion, emit a shockwave that slows enemy champions hit by 60% for 2s.
Also gain 20% Tenacity an 20% slow Resist for 4s.

(45s Cooldown) 500


This boot enchant grants a hefty boost in movement speed, then emits a shockwave that significantly slows nearby enemies and briefly increases your tenacity and slow resistance.
Perfect for initiators and tanks to engage swiftly and hold the frontline.
